human_interpretation.what_this_means: Collatz isn't random‚Äîit's gradient descent on a dissipative manifold where ln(n) is potential energy
human_interpretation.key_insight: The '+1' in 3n+1 creates 'arithmetic friction' via binary carry propagation, forcing trajectories to sample the natural 2-adic density (geometric distribution with mean 2). This yields expected strain ln(3/4) < 0 per cycle.
human_interpretation.why_n_equals_1_special: It's the unique 'vacuum state' (V=0), the only attractor. All paths flow toward it.
human_interpretation.the_gap: Proof assumes Collatz trajectories sample the manifold's intrinsic density uniformly. This is highly plausible (entropy from +1, carry chains) but not yet rigorously proven for ALL integers.
human_interpretation.brutal_summary: 3<4, so you always divide more than multiply. QED.
